CustomField.description:
PC users : Press Windows key + R. Type cmd and enter. On command window paste "WMIC BIOS GET SERIALNUMBER" to get your service tag number.
MAC Users : https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204308
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
PC users : Press Windows key + R. Type cmd and enter. On command window paste "WMIC BIOS GET SERIALNUMBER" to get your service tag number.
MAC Users : https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204308
CustomField.label: Serial/Service Tag Number
